DOC.brief_summary: The aim study determine effect supplementation n-3 fatty acid placebo 10 week expression Sirt-1 , AdipoR1 & AdipoR2 gene peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMC ) circulatory level Resistin , MCP-1 Adiponectin type2 diabetes patient
DOC.brief_title: The Effect n-3 Fatty Acid Supplementation Serum Levels , Gene Expression type2 Diabetes Patient
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study determine effect supplementation n-3 fatty acid placebo 10 week expression Sirt-1 , AdipoR1 ( adiponectin receptor 1 ) & AdipoR2 ( adiponectin receptor 2 ) gene peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMC ) circulatory level Resistin , MCP-1 ( Monocyte Chemoattractant Protein-1 ) Adiponectin type2 diabetes patient . In randomized , double-blind clinical trial , placebo-controlled , 88 men woman type 2 diabetes enrol study Iranian Diabetes Association . After sign informed consent individual complete general information form , 24-hour food recall 3 day beck depression questionnaire take participant begin end study . Selected sample randomly classify 2 block group receive supplement placebo . The supplement group , receive mg 1800mg EPA ( Eicosapentaenoic acid ) & 900mg DHA ( docosahexaenoic acid ) ( total=2700mg ) 10 week placebo group also receive placebo ( contain 2700 mg edible paraffin ) ( similar term color , shape size ) . Patients recommend sustain diet medication dose ( ) study also advise maintain constant level physical activity . Blood sample collect 12 hour fast anthropometric variable , biochemical parameter , target gene expression physical activity trial measure
DOC.criteria: willingness participation , diabetic patient 30 60 year old , body mass index range 2540 , avoidance dietary supplement , vitamin herbal product least 3 month throughout intervention people use n3 Fatty Acid Supplementation last 3 month , chronic renal disease , GI disease , Hepatobiliary diseases , hematological disorder , hypo hyperthyroidism , type 1 diabetes , treatment orlistat sibutramine weight loss , pregnancy lactation , treatment insulin Thiazolidinediones .
